Hello, World

January 15, 2024

This is a sample post. Move your existing posts from _posts/ into this theme’s _posts/ folder and they’ll work automatically.

Writing

Just write in Markdown. The theme stays out of your way.

def hello():
    print("Hello, World")

A blockquote looks like this.

Links work fine. Images work fine. Code blocks look clean.
